featured.text: There is no death; only a change of worlds—the author delivers these reassurances to readers in this book, based on the customs of the Plains Indians in America.
The snow-capped mountain is described so _____ in the book that the scene seems to come alive in front of the reader’s eyes.
A good reader can often figure out what new words mean by using .
To inform the reader how to reduce stress.

other.text: Sherlock Holmes, a detective in a popular fiction series, has impressed readers with his amazing powers of _____ and his knowledge of trivial facts.
What is the major message the author is trying to convey to readers? (A) All people, especially those working in the hospitals, should reduce the use of plastics.
Sometimes authors write about these things to entertain readers.

definition.en_def: A person who reads or who is reading.
definition.example: The reader enjoyed the novel from start to finish.
